title: Zanzibar in use...
content:
Gabor Kothay’s Zanzibar is one of those fonts, that when you buy it, you won’t know what to do with it. It’s so fabulous—it’s mind boggling (much like myself) !

Well, here it is on Nantaka Joy:  
 [http://www.nantakajoy.com/cgi-local/shop.cgi](http://web.archive.org/web/20100807034945/http:/www.nantakajoy.com/cgi-local/shop.cgi "http://www.nantakajoy.com/cgi-local/shop.cgi")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100807034945im_/http:/typophile.com/files/imageserver_5712.cgi.jpeg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100807034945im_/http:/typophile.com/files/imageserver-1_6558.cgi.jpeg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100807034945im_/http:/typophile.com/files/imageserver-2_3871.cgi.jpeg)

Snag this superlovely font here:  
 [http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fountain/zanzibar\_regular/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100807034945/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fountain/zanzibar_regular/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fountain/zanzibar\_regular/")

Mikey D :-)
author: SuperUltraFabulous
